mito -data state.json src.cel
! stderr .
cmp stdout want.txt

-- state.json --
{"n": 0}
-- src.cel --
int(state.n).as(n, {
	"state": {
		"n":         n+1,
		"want_more": n+1 < 5,
	}
})
-- want.txt --
{
	"state": {
		"n": 1,
		"want_more": true
	}
}
{
	"state": {
		"n": 2,
		"want_more": true
	}
}
{
	"state": {
		"n": 3,
		"want_more": true
	}
}
{
	"state": {
		"n": 4,
		"want_more": true
	}
}
{
	"state": {
		"n": 5,
		"want_more": false
	}
}
